vsParam:
Ah, Ayesha.
What are you reading?

Puff... puff...
Too much medicine... I can't eat any more...
Turns out she's sleeping instead of reading!?

Boo-hoo...
My candy falls into the alchemical Cauldron...

So many candies come out of the alchemical Cauldron...
Hmm, wow... the atelier is packed with candies...
You'll catch a cold sleeping here.

Ah! Wh-where am I!?
... Hmm? Did I fall asleep...

Er... Hmm, weird.
Did I fall asleep?

Ayesha, how could you sleep here? And we can tell that
you didn't sleep well from your sleep-talking!

Oh, my? I talked in my sleep?
Boo-hoo, so humiliating...

There are so many books here...
You were reading all these books?

Yes. There are many interesting ones.
I was engrossed reading them and got tired...

You just wanted to take a nap, but you fell asleep
completely, right... Hehe, I do that too.

Hee hee, this happens to Anise, too?
I mean, there are so many books here.

In addition to all kinds of reference books for alchemy,
there are many other interesting books!

Yes. This is the library, the very building that the Academy
is proud of! You can find anything and everything here.

Brilliant... In my world,
it's very hard to get alchemy-related books.

So I wanted to read more of them when I have the chance,
but I got greedy, so...

Uh, Ayesha?
Do you intend to continue reading books here!?
Hmm? Yes, I haven't read much...

Not much!? What are those stacked here!
I wouldn't have the patience!

Hehe, we are all different, Sorel.
But Ayesha, you better take a good rest today.

That's right! You are so tired and groaned in your sleep!
And you talked a lot in your dream!

Boo-hoo, please forget that...
OK, I'll go back and rest...
